text_block_list.text:
Eccentrics aside, T.M. Opera O was proudly persisting on 
the remarkably difficult path of believing in your dreams.

Her heart certainly holds something exceedingly important 
to all horsegirls who choose life on the turf. Hoping to talk 
to her again, I started looking around the academy ——

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Ah, you lone rays of sunlight breaking through the canopy! 
Won't you shed your light on the world with me?

She seeks the brilliance of a high king whose light shines upon 
the world like the sun, and in this her conviction is strong.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: A new day, yet same old me — radiant as ever! Ha-ha-ha-ha-ha! Haa-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!!

She must be off to a new spot where she can continue 
her particular brand of training.

Looking at her, I can see the strength in her running. 
Thinking back on the training I've seen her do ——

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Aah! My dancing figure calls to mind the elegance of a swan…!!

It would require a great sense of balance 
to execute those steps and jumps.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Aah! My figure dancing on air calls to mind the elegance of a swallow…!!

Diving into the pool like that would require 
a strong mind as well, unbending and capable 
of dealing with a wide range of situations.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: May my beauty spread throughout the world and fill it with cheer and laughter…!

The power and speed she exhibited in ascending those 
daunting steps at the shrine hint at her true abilities.

She's not simply speaking of becoming the high king. 
She possesses the power and conviction to be one.
One day, I might really see her don that crown ——
choice_data_list: Wait up, please! T.M. Opera O!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Did I just hear someone call my name…?

Was she too far away already? 
It doesn't seem like she's turning around.

Then I'm simply not shouting loud enough… 
Perhaps if I channel her high king energy…!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Do I hear……!!?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I can't believe my eyes! 
What brings you here, my dear ex-trainer?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I am positive the air carried the majestic laughter of 
the high king…… Pray tell, what has befallen you?
choice_data_list: I want to be able to stand beside you.
I want to be able to stand beside you.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Do I hear right!? You mean you wish 
to become my trainer once more!?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Is that the reason behind your majestic laughter!? Is it really…… heheh… hahahaa!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Haaa-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha! How entertaining, my dear trainer!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
However! Should you truly wish to become my trainer, 
we must share the same objectives, don't you agree?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
To that end, let me affirm your thoughts on mine! 
How does the high king reflect in your eyes?
choice_data_list:
As one who grants dreams 
through overwhelming victories!

As one who grants dreams 
through overwhelming victories!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Ah… how wondrous!! Your words are 
flawless, excellent, my dear trainer…!!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
A high king, in their supremacy, bestows the gift of courage 
upon the people! They become a beacon for their life's path!!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Accordingly, yours truly can not be content with mere 
first places. Only by grasping undeniable victory in these 
hands will I become The Era's High King!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hence, can I assume that you are proclaiming your allegiance 
to accompany me to the conclusion of this conquest?!
choice_data_list: I will render you The Era's High King!
I will render you The Era's High King!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Haaa-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha! My trainer, your words are impeccable once more! Let us set forth on our conquest together, a legend in the making!!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Very well, let us then mark the occasion in some fashion… 
What say you to a photograph!?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Owning a memento with yours truly is a rare and valuable thing. 
You are in luck. Come, grant this high king you widest smile!

The next day, I was sent a photograph which 
featured almost exclusively T.M. Opera O.
It was our first step on the glorious road that she envisioned.
